title: The Cokeville Miracle
description: On May 9, 1986, a small ranching community in Wyoming experiences a divine intervention when a couple detonates a bomb inside a crowded classroom.

reviews.text: True story elevates it's worthiness but the acting fell short in my opinion. Non-believers will loathe this movie but then again I doubt whether they go anyways. Faith is hard to project on a screen but some directors can pull it off better than others. Can't dispute the moral of the story.
